message.content:
{
  "weekly_summary": "The week exhibited mixed market trends with high volatility and exceptional volumes in smallcap sectors like banking (IDBI, UCOBANK), infrastructure (NBCC, HUDCO), and healthcare (NH). Midcaps showed strength in infrastructure (GMRAIRPORT, MAZDOCK) and consumer goods (NYKAA, RADICO). Portfolio holdings displayed overall stability but a net decline, driven by losses in SAIL and minor drops in NBCC, offset by gains in BEL and KPIGREEN. Opportunities emerged in resilient sectors like healthcare and banking for diversification amid cyclical recoveries.",
